card.title: Ukraine and allies push for 30-day ceasefire starting Monday
card.description: Leaders from four major European countries have threatened to ratchet up pressure on Russian President Vladimir Putin if he does not accept an unconditional 30-day ceasefire in Ukraine that they offered in a strong show of unity with Kyiv. The leaders of France, the United Kingdom, Germany and Poland said their proposal for a ceasefire to start on Monday was supported by U.S. President Donald Trump, whom they had briefed over the phone. There was no immediate response from Moscow, whose own unilateral three-day ceasefire declared for the 80th anniversary of victory over Nazi Germany expires Saturday.
card.image_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, left, Britain's Prime Minister Keir Starmer, right, and French President Emmanuel Macron, center, talk during a meeting in Kyiv, Ukraine, Saturday, May 10, 2025. (Stefan Rousseau/PA via AP, Pool)

card.title: Course Seven ‚Äì Tracing Your English Ancestors
card.description: Students in this class may themselves be an immigrant from England, or their ancestors may have left in the 17th Century, or could be from any period in between. Students may be struggling to know where to begin, or to understand how to go deeper into the records. content:
I am not playing anymore is Honkai Star Rail. Love the game, but MiHoYo is strike breaking, hiring new voice actors for Stelle and Caelus, and I can‚Äôt abide by that. I mentioned this in the discord for the Warframe Dojo I mentioned and they said that what SAG-AFTRA wanted was vague, so being able to come to terms would have been difficult anyway. Now, that sounds like MiHoYo‚Äôs opinion/justification. Though even if that were true, this might be the desired endpoint. The union had been lax with union people working in non-union shops, but are hardening their stance. So this might be a way to get members off of non-union projects while making a point. Also, hurting MiHoYo‚Äôs bottom line with people like me quitting their games.

Sad to be missing out on the lore, but I‚Äôll find something else. Already deleted off of my PS5 and Tablet, with PC and Phone yet to go.
